eternal_protectors.name: Eternal Protectors
eternal_protectors.description: The Eternal Protectors are sworn to protect those who cannot protect themselves and to ward off evil. They wear tough armor and wield mighty weapons to strike down those are unjust.

ogre_mercenaries.name: Ogre Mercenaries
ogre_mercenaries.description: Large-bodied mercenaries with huge appetites for gold and destruction

greatogre_raiders.name: Greatogre Raiders
greatogre_raiders.description: The greatest of ogre tribes, who only interact with their lessers when they need something - food, coin, or just a challenge!

vampire_lords.name: Vampire Lords
vampire_lords.description: The Vampire Lords are powerful vampires who command legions of undead to do their bidding. They defeat their foes with powerful death magic and hordes of undead.

bone.name: Bone
bone.description: Raising endless armies of skeletal soldiers to do their bidding.

blood.name: Blood
blood.description: Fledgling vampires are eager to drink and don't have the patience for just biting their enemies.

dread.name: Dread
dread.description: Using illusions, necromancy and their own kin against their foes, these Vampire Lords are masters of attritional warfare.

traitor_legions.name: Traitor Legions
traitor_legions.description: The Traitor Legions are those who chose to fight for evil instead of order and made a pact with the dark gods. The Traitor Legions use deadly traitor warriors and other barbarians to swiftly crush their foes.

change.name: Magic
change.description: Mighty Sorcerers that bring down a storm of spells, empowered by hordes of cultists that give their life in pursuit of knowledge.

pestilence.name: Pestilence
pestilence.description: The forces of the unstoppable decay of all life, born anew as a warrior of the dark gods.

wrath.name: Wrath
wrath.description: Warriors of unbridled fury, filled with an eternal bloodlust and always looking for ever greater foes to still it.

excess.name: Excess
excess.description: Sadistic and twisted Warriors, always seeking for new ways of ecstasy.

deception.name: Deception
deception.description: Agents of chaos that undermine enemy forces and crumble them from within or lead a corrupt government themselves.

haunting_ghosts.name: Haunting Ghosts
haunting_ghosts.description: The Haunting Ghosts are a collection of undead spirits which haunt their hallowed grave sites. The Ghostly Undead use fear and ethereal movement to wash over their foes and scare them into defeat.

high_elves.name: High Elves
high_elves.description: Masters of the Arcane, this ancient island nation is shrouded in mystery.

temple.name: Phoenix Temple
temple.description: Defenders of the Temple of the Last Flame, leading crusades agains the forces that seek to destroy it.

polis.name: Polis
polis.description: An amalgamation of several city states, masters of urban fighting and outlasting sieges.

orcs_and_goblins.name: Orcs and Goblins
orcs_and_goblins.description: A savage race made up of various warring tribes.

speed.name: Speed
speed.description: This force focuses on using chariots, boars and anything that goes fast.

trickery.name: Trickery
trickery.description: Striking in moonlight, these masters of deception, as far as orcs are concerned, use outflanking and ambush maneuvers to gain the upper hand.

primal.name: Primal
primal.description: Empowered by their animalistic gods, the strongest warriors charge into battle with fearsome beasts at their side.

sea_elves.name: Sea Elves
sea_elves.description: Raising from the depths of the ocean, transmuted by their ancient magic.

dwarves.description: A stout race of miners, engineers and warriors.

blast.name: Shock Wave
blast.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 3 hits with AP 1. This power may be cast unlimited times.
blast.flavor: This enemy is hit by a single blast of shock.

light_armor.name: Light Armor
light_armor.description: This model has +1 to its Save characteristic.

heavy_armor.name: Heavy Armor
heavy_armor.description: This model has +2 to its Save characteristic.

skirmishers.name: Skirmishers
skirmishers.description: This unit has a 4" coherency and may not be more than 8" away from any model in the unit at the end of a move action.

ethereal.name: Ethereal
ethereal.description: This model may ignore other models and any terrain when moving.

shield.name: Shield
shield.description: This model increases its Save by 1.

damage_table_warmachine.name: Damage Table(Warmachine)
damage_table_warmachine.description:
When this model would be killed, roll a D10 adding the amount it failed the save by (to a maximum of 5) plus the number of critical damage tokens it has and refer to the following: 
 * Glance(1-2): Take one additional shock. 
 * Stunned(3-4): The unit permenantly suffers -1 Courage. 
 * Damaged(5-6): The unit permenantly suffers -1 Accuracy and -1 Strength. 
 * Slowed(7-8): The unit permenantly halves its movement. 
 * Shellshock(9-10): Take 2 additional shock and immediately take a Courage test. If failed the unit is destroyed. 
 * Destroyed(11+): It is instantly destroyed. 
 * Explosion(13+): The unit explodes and all units within 6" gain 2 Shock. 


 Mark each time the unit rolls on the table with a critical damage token. If that token is removed, the effect of the table is removed. If a unit contains multiple models with Damage Table(x), hits must be assigned to models with a critical damage token first.

banner.name: Banner
banner.description: This unit may re-roll a single failed Courage test when removing Shock.

musician.name: Musician
musician.description: This unit may re-roll a single failed Initiative test when sprinting.

leeching.name: Leeching
leeching.description: Roll a D10 each time this weapon deals damage to a _Leader_ unit. On a 1 or 2 this model regains one Wound.

buckler.name: Buckler
buckler.description: This model has +1 Save against melee attacks.

icon_x.name: Icon
icon_x.description: Friendly units of X types within 6" may re-roll a single failed Courage test when removing Shock.

spectral.name: Spectral
spectral.description: Hit rolls of 1 or 2 from this weapon cause 2 hits instead of 1. Additional hits must be assigned to the same model.
